course.title: Statistics for Data Science and Business Analysis
course.subtitle: Statistics you need in the office: Descriptive & Inferential statistics, Hypothesis testing, Regression analysis

reviews.body:
The content is definitely what I want learn about. The presentation are very clear and attractive. It drives me to keep watching. The course notes and the the exercises are also very helpful.

The only minus is the explanation of some of the later topics, such as the F-statistics, are too fast. If the instructor can include some more materials for the students for further reading will be great.

This course is very useful to the people who wants to learn statistics for datascience.Professor Illiya had explained all the statistics concepts in a clear and organized manner,the animations made course very interesting
I've been working with large datasets for some time in Excel and R. This was a much-needed foundation I am happy to now have in place!!

Overall it is a very good course for people wanting to brush up on their previous statistics knowledge . However, for any one brand new to statistics the sections from inferential statistics to the end will be more challenging without additional external resources, especially if you want to master the ideas and concepts.

I liked the variety of topics covered in this course and it has been extremely helpful to me in forming a foundational knowledge of statistical concepts. However, there have been times when the topic wasn't clear in the definition. My suggestion would be to add some extensive reading material in this course that one could read to solidify their understanding and enhance on it.
The Course Is good, good for the people who want to know basics, the basics are explained very effectively with good examples, I can say is the best one can deliver.

The Course was good but I wish there could be more examples for Regression Analysis in the course. At the end all the Assumptions are not covered and that leaves lack clarity on the subject. At the start of regression, the session started of saying it is based on ANOVA. It is not that every person has idea on ANOVA. The coach could have given some clarity on what ANOVA is about. Apart from that till Hypothesis testing the course was great but after that it was a bit fast and lillte hard to understand for a person who is not from Statistic background. Thanks a lot sir for the great explanation of all the topics and I personally wish there could be more examples for regression analysis at the end of the session covering all the assumption and interpretation of the data. Thank you.
I was searching for a good course that gives me the basics for stats without confusing me, this is the 'go to' course for it! I am glad I found this course!

I like how they have presented the subject of statistics as an interesting field which can be applied in many aspects of life, including when making business decisions. However, there is room for improvement in terms of making your explanations even clearer with more exercises, and practicals especially in the Regression Analysis section. All in all, well done guys.

Good and simple explanation of all the concepts. One of the best course for beginner and intermediate learners.

But the course literature is not available which can be used at any time to go through the basics or for revision.

Also if possible please include lectures on probability or is there a separate course on that.
At the end I felt like some topics of statistics are left out. And more focussed on regression. Continuity is good but I feel some voidness

Why did the exercises stop around Section 14? The exercises what allowed us to really learn the content, suddenly the course switched from an interactive course to a lecture. I can watch videos on youtube for free if that was the content I was after. Everything before Section 14 was great, and then suddenly it felt like the course just wanted to wrap things up quickly.

instructor.name: 365 Careers
instructor.briefIntroduction:
365 Careers is the #1 best-selling provider of finance courses on Udemy. The company’s courses have been taken by more than 1,000,000 students in 210 countries. People working at world-class firms like Apple, PayPal, and Citibank have completed 365 Careers trainings.  

Currently, the firm focuses on the following topics on Udemy:  

1) Finance – Finance fundamentals, Financial modeling in Excel, Valuation, Accounting, Capital budgeting, Financial statement analysis (FSA), Investment banking (IB), Leveraged buyout (LBO), Financial planning and analysis (FP&A), Corporate budgeting, applying Python for Finance, Tesla valuation case study, CFA, ACCA, and CPA

2) Data science – Statistics, Mathematics, Probability, SQL, Python programming, Python for Finance, Business Intelligence, R, Machine Learning, TensorFlow, Tableau, the integration of SQL and Tableau, the integration of SQL, Python, Tableau, Power BI, Credit Risk Modeling, and Credit Analytics

3) Entrepreneurship – Business Strategy, Management and HR Management, Marketing, Decision Making, Negotiation, and Persuasion, Tesla's Strategy and Marketing

4) Office productivity – Microsoft Excel, PowerPoint, Microsoft Word, and Microsoft Outlook

5) Blockchain for Business

All of the company’s courses are:  

Pre-scripted  

Hands-on  

Laser-focused  

Engaging  

Real-life tested  

By choosing 365 Careers, you make sure you will learn from proven experts, who have a passion for teaching, and can take you from beginner to pro in the shortest possible amount of time.  

If you want to become a financial analyst, a finance manager, an FP&A analyst, an investment banker, a business executive, an entrepreneur, a business intelligence analyst, a data analyst, or a data scientist, 365 Careers’ courses are the perfect place to start.
